## capitalize() function

Capitalizes the word

It turns "zero" to "Zero"

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function capitalize(s: string): string | undefined;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  s | string |  |
